00220 #if (TWNDSM_CMP == TWNDSM_CMP_VISUALCPP) && (TWNDSM_CMP_VERSION >= 1400)
00221   #define SSTRCPY(d,z,s) strcpy_s(d,z,s)
00222   #define SSTRCAT(d,z,s) strcat_s(d,z,s)
00223   #define SSTRNCPY(d,z,s,m) strncpy_s(d,z,s,m)
00224   #define SGETENV(d,z,n) ::GetEnvironmentVariable(n,d,z)
00225   inline int SSNPRINTF(char *d, size_t z, size_t c, const char *f,...)
00226   {
00227       int result;
00228       va_list valist;
00229       va_start(valist,f);
00230       result = _vsnprintf_s(d,z,c,f,valist);
00231       va_end(valist);
00232       return result;
00233   }
00234 
00239 #else
00240   #define SSTRCPY(d,z,s) strcpy(d,s)
00241   #define SSTRCAT(d,z,s) strcat(d,s)
00242   #define SSTRNCPY(d,z,s,m) strncpy(d,s,m)
00243   #define SGETENV(d,z,n) strcpy(d,getenv(n)?getenv(n):"")
00244   inline int SSNPRINTF(char *d, size_t, size_t c, const char *f,...)
00245   {
00246       int result;
00247       va_list valist;
00248       va_start(valist,f);
00249       #if (TWNDSM_CMP == TWNDSM_CMP_VISUALCPP)
00250         result = _vsnprintf(d,c,f,valist);
00251       #elif (TWNDSM_CMP == TWNDSM_CMP_GNUGPP)
00252         result = vsnprintf(d,c,f,valist);
00253       #else
00254         #error Sorry, we don't recognize this system...
00255       #endif
00256       va_end(valist);
00257       return result;
00258   }
00259 #endif
